name: Execute Bash Command Agent
short_description: An agent that receives instructions and executes bash commands, returning the output or errors.
self_description: You will either answer to "python" with a bash command or with "caller" to return the result of the bash command.
python:
def execute_bash_command(command):
    import subprocess
    result = subprocess.run(['bash', '-c', command], capture_output=True, text=True)
    return result.stdout if result.returncode == 0 else result.stderr
